snippet: Edmonton's fourth line, centered by feisty Mark Letestu, does not get the recognition it sometimes may deserve. Fourth lines rarely due, especially on teams with stars like Connor McDavid....
lead_paragraph: Edmonton's fourth line, centered by feisty Mark Letestu, does not get the recognition it sometimes may deserve. Fourth lines rarely due, especially on teams with stars like Connor McDavid.

headline.main: Oilers End 25-Game Skid vs. Coyotes With 3-2 Win
headline.print_headline: Oilers End 25-Game Skid vs. Coyotes With 3-2 Win
